put.description: Creates or updates an authorized principal.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the authorized principal.

get.description: Gets all authorized principals in a fleet.

put.description: Creates or updates a firewall rule.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the firewall rule.

get.description: Gets all firewall rules in a fleet.

post.description: Moves database to a different tier.

put.description: Creates or updates a fleet database.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the fleet database.

204.description: The specified fleet database does not exist.

get.description: Gets all fleet databases in a fleetspace.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of elements in the collection to skip.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of elements to return from the collection.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An OData filter expression that filters elements in the collection.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: An opaque token that identifies a starting point in the collection.

get.description: Gets all fleets in a resource group.

200.description: Successfully fetched fleets in resource group.

put.description: Creates or updates a fleet resource.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the fleet.

get.description: Gets all fleets in a subscription.

200.description: Successfully retrieved all fleets in the subscription.

put.description: Creates or updates a fleetspace resource.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the fleetspace.
Successfully fetched fleetspaces in a fleet.
Successfully created or updated the tier.

post.description: Migrates existing logical server into fleet.

get.description: List the operations for the provider

applicationId.description: Application Id of the authorized principal.

objectId.description: Object Id of the authorized principal.

tenantId.description: Tenant Id of the authorized principal.

principalType.description: Principal type of the authorized principal.

sqlUserType.description: SQL user type of the authorized principal. Extra: Database user, Sever: Server user, Default: Server admin

role.description: Role assigned to the authorized principal.

AuthorizedPrincipal.description: A database fleet manager authorized principal.

AuthorizedPrincipalListResult.description: A list of SQL database fleet manager authorized principal.

FirewallRule.description: A SQL Database Fleet firewall rule.

FirewallRuleListResult.description: A list of SQL Database fleet firewall rules.

originalDatabaseId.description: Resource identifier for the underlying database resource.

createMode.description: Create mode. Always default (To do, add modes).

tierName.description: Name of the tier this database belongs to.

connectionString.description: Connection string to connect to the database with.

restoreFromTime.description: Restore from time when CreateMode is PointInTimeRestore.

sourceDatabaseName.description: Source database name used when CreateMode is Copy or PointInTimeRestore.

FleetDatabaseListResult.description: A list of SQL Database Fleets.

FleetListResult.description: A list of SQL Database Fleets.

mainPrincipal.description: Main AAD principal that has admin access to all databases in the fleet.

applicationId.description: Application Id of the main principal.

objectId.description: Object Id of the main principal.

tenantId.description: Tenant Id of the main principal.

principalType.description: Principal type of the main principal.

FleetspaceListResult.description: A list of SQL Database fleetspaces.

serverless.description: If true, serverless resources are provisioned in the tier.

serviceTier.description: Service tier of provisioned resources, for example GeneralPurpose.

family.description: Family of provisioned resources, for example Gen5.

capacity.description: Capacity of provisioned resources in the tier, in units matching the specified service tier, for example vCore for GeneralPurpose.

poolNumOfDatabasesMax.description: Maximum number of databases per pool.

numOfEmptyPreprovisionedDatabases.description: Number of empty preprovisioned databases for fast database provisioning.

databaseCapacityMin.description: Minimum allocated capacity per database, in units matching the specified service tier.

databaseCapacityMax.description: Maximum allocated capacity per database, in units matching the specified service tier.

FleetTierListResult.description: A list of SQL Database fleet tiers.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: API version to use for the request.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: Name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
